summary: REQ-7 asks to deploy/publish the already-updated Valentine page so the shareable link shows the exact prompt text live. The diff only adds documentation and code/config changes; it does not provide evidence of an actual production deployment/publish action tied to the specified shareable URL. Several unrequested changes were introduced (publishing doc, cache-control headers, backend change, and additional UI copy/behavior).

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy/publish the current application version so the updated home-screen prompt text ("Maniha will you be my valentines") is live and visible at https://caffeine.ai/chat/019c2016-f519-7768-a217-0bd548a606d8.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains no evidence of an actual deployment/publish step or configuration that would ensure the specified shareable link now serves the latest deployed (non-draft) version. It only adds a manual checklist document and local code changes; acceptance criteria about the live link and hard refresh/incognito behavior cannot be confirmed from the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new publishing/deployment checklist document (Publishing Checklist) with build/deploy steps and verification items.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7 is to deploy/publish the current version so the link shows updated text; it does not request new documentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added cache-control meta headers (no-cache/no-store/must-revalidate) to the HTML entry point.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-7; it changes runtime caching behavior rather than performing the deployment itself.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified backend actor to include blob-storage/Mixin storage logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-7 (which is about publishing the already-updated frontend copy). This is a backend behavior change unrelated to the stated deployment requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/changed additional user-facing UI text/behavior beyond the specified main prompt, including hint text with emojis and other interaction/UI elements described in summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly say not to change existing UI copy beyond what is already implemented and not to add new features/flows; REQ-7 only concerns publishing so the existing updated prompt is live.
